name: Summer of Love
description:
Story Plot: At the start of the story, you're living with your girlfriend, Nina. Both you and Nina are working as instructors in a yoga center. One day, she asks you to let a guy work there with you and her. Your mother also asks you to let her boyfriend stay with you. You can refuse to let them join the story (Harem Route). If you allow them to appear in the story, you'll have to try to keep the women for yourself. In this choice, you can decide to share your girlfriend with them (Netorase Route) or not. But if you fail to keep them for you, you'll be living in hell (Netorare Route)! Besides, you can also decide to swap couples (Swinging Route) with your new neighbors or not. Your choices will take you to different endings.

Summer of Love is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings.
  • If you hate NTR (Netorare & Netorase), what you need to do is refusing to let Kayne (Nina's friend) and Joe (your mother's boyfriend) join the story.
  • If you want a thrilling feeling, you can let the guys join the story but stop them any time they try to seduce the women.
  • If you let them join the story but fail to stop them, you'll be living in hell!

Notice:
  • Pregnancy is optional. When the game reaches the final stage, there will be choices for you to decide to impregnate the women or not.
  • If you can't have the endings you want, please use the walkthroughs: one with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster) or one without preview images (it won't spoil the story). The walkthroughs are in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Summer of Love (Captain Kitty).
  • At the moment, I'm working to improve the writing (as well as fixing all typos) in Summer of Love. Around January 2024, I will release a fixed build with better writing. This release will also have sound effects.

Summer of Love is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) so it contains a lot of erotic scenes. There are nearly 6,000 images (including 166 erotic animations). Depending on how you play, the game length will be around 2-3 hours.

Thank you for playing Summer of Love.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!
